item.title: A Forced Hiatus, a Quiet Faith, and the Resolve to Continue
item.description: The Forced Hiatus Since the second half of 2025, my life has quite literally been shit. Family issues. My grandmother falling ill. My bank account being drained (losing tens of thousands of dollars of my hard-earned money). Repeated blows to my long-term relationship. And eventually, having to pause my Masterâ€™s program. I started 2025 on a strong note, with a clear list of goals, and I was on track to complete them all.
